review_text: This restaurant was great. The food was amazing. Our waiter was excellent. The appetizers in particular were very creative and well-thought-out.
I really enjoyed my meal, and my daughter's steak was perfectly prepared. The chocolate torte was superb.
The service was terrible! The food was ok, but the bread was stale and the drinks were very weak.
Not a must-do. Perfectly adequate but nothing special for the price.
I can't recommend this place. Service was slow and unfriendly. Food so-so.
Definitely a good choice for a special occasion. Highly recommended!
